insert into long_hu_detail (long_hu_id, symbol, trade_date, buy_amt, sell_amt, net_buy, sec_dept_code, date_type, clique_id, relation, gmt_create, gmt_update) values
(#{detail.longHuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.tradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.buyAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detail.sellAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detail.netBuy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detail.secDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.dateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail.cliqueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.relation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{detail.gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select:
select
from long_hu_detail where sec_dept_code=#{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND long_hu_id IN (SELECT id FROM long_hu WHERE operate_clique=#{cliqueId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND trade_date > #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND trade_date < #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT count(*) FROM long_hu_detail WHERE sec_dept_code=#{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND date_type=1 AND long_hu_id IN (SELECT id FROM long_hu WHERE operate_clique=#{cliqueId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND trade_date > #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND trade_date < #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update long_hu_detail set clique_id = null where long_hu_id=#{longHuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT trade_date, symbol FROM long_hu_detail WHERE trade_date >= #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND trade_date <= #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sec_dept_code IN (SELECT dept FROM synergy_detail WHERE s_g=#{synergyGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}) GROUP BY long_hu_id HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT count(*) FROM synergy_detail WHERE s_g=#{synergyGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
